metadata.title: CVE-2017-5616 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in cgiemail and cgiecho allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the addendumparameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5616` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cgiemail - 1.6-37+deb7u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cgiemail package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6-37+deb7u1build0.16.04.1').
